titleStmt.title: A briefe abstract of the Kings letters to the Queene. VVith some observations thereupon. VVherein His Majesties actions are deciphered. / By a person of qualitie.
titleStmt.author: S. E.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Hannah Allen in Popes-head-Alley at the signe of the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb. 20"; the 8 in imprint date crossed out and the date altered to 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Popes-head-Alley at the signe of the Crowne
